item.title: Fasting Pills
item.description: Fasting Pills Kollel Toronto: https://kollel.com/fasting-pills/ Relief from Headaches and Nausea on Yom Kippur!! Also, other fast days: Tisha B’Av, Asarah B’Teves, 17 Tamuz and Tzom Gedaliah Headaches (migraines) and nausea are not uncommon during the fast days. However, for many, the severity can be debilitating. The Kollel is the supplier of a specially formulated sustained-timed release capsules, to alleviate unnecessary suffering on fast days. The non prescription pills are specially formulated by compounding pharmacists and are available as acetylsalicylic acid (aspirin), acetaminophen (tylenol), ibuprofen (advil) or caffeine (equivalent to two cups of coffee) in a vegetable based capsule.
